name: radical_position
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool learn_to_read_and_write_japanese_kanji.
Tool description: Free API to the Kanji alive web application with CC-BY licensed language data on Japanese kanji, radicals and associated media files.
API description: The Advanced Search URL parameters are described here as individual endpoints to permit per parameter testing. Parameters may be combined as required.

rpos.description: The radical position in Hiragana or Romaji.
